page.title: 08CERES HIGHLAND GAMES
page.content: This year,{1985,}is the{671st {anniversary}of{Ceres Games}held in {commemoration}of the{men}of {Bannock-Burn.}The place where they are held is called{Bow Butts}and people come from all over Scotland to attend the oldest games in Scotland. The Games are held on the last Saturday in June,from 1pm till 5pm. The events,which include{running, {cycling,throwing,sprinting,the {tug of war and horse racing,}are started off by races for local girls and boys.There is also{dancing}which goes on for 4 hours.The most popular event is the tug of war with prize money of{Â£500.} Instead of an entrance fee there are collections donations from the village a raffle and some races are sponsored. Disaster struck a few years ago when a horse had to be destroyed.
